price: Kështu humbi gjurma e atij populli keqbërës. Lavdërimi qoftë i Allahut, Zotit të gjithësisë.
arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: faquṭiʿa dābiru al-qawmi alladhīna ẓalamū wal-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
